DOC.brief_summary: Swallowing and speech difficulties will be observed in patients post laryngectomy. These difficulties will cause decreased in quality of life.
DOC.brief_title: Speech and Swallowing Characteristics of Patients After Laryngectomy and the Effect on Quality of Life
DOC.detailed_description: This study will explore the characteristics of speech and swallowing problems of patients who underwent laryngectomy.The relationship between swallowing disturbances and speech difficulties will be studied and the effect of each problem on quality of life will be messured.
DOC.criteria: patients post total laryngectomy with voice prothesis patients who can not read and respod to questions
